subject: Thank you for accelerating materials discovery
body:
Hi Eun-Ah,

I'm genuinely grateful for the work AI-MI is doing to bring AI and materials science together. It's the kind of foundational research that actually moves the needle on real problemsâ€”from energy to quantum tech.

I'm building Ouro, where researchers publish datasets and computational tools as APIs that others can actually use, not just read about in a methods section. Your group's work becomes discoverable and citable. Given how much AI-MI is designed around workflows and community tools, I think it could amplify what you're already building.

Would a 15-minute call be useful to explore if it fits your workflow?

Thanks,
[Your name]
